body.name: Projector, XuanPad 2024 Upgraded Mini Projector, Video Projector HD 1080P Supported, Portable Home Projector Compatible with TV Stick, HDMI, USB, Laptop, iPhone, Android for Home Entertainment
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 4 hrs 34 mins
features: 💖【Upgraded Viewing Experience & High Brightness】 The XuanPad upgrade projector adopts advanced LED light source and LCD display technology, providing 12000L high brightness and supporting high-definition image quality of Full HD 1080p for an excellent visual experience. The latest NTSC color technology and advanced image edge processing algorithm accurately restore every detail on the screen, bringing wonderful visual enjoyment.

💖【Immersive Projection Size & Long Lamp Life】 The XuanPad projector has a projection size of 30 to 200 inches and a projection distance of 1m to 5m. With an extra-large projection size of 200 inches, you can enjoy a immersive viewing experience and share great moments of movies, games, and sports events with family and friends. The powerful heat dissipation system effectively extends the lamp's life to 55,000 hours, and allows you to enjoy entertainment for a longer time.

💖【 Noise Reducing & Zoom function】 Advanced noise-reduction technology reduces fan noise by 80%, ensuring crystal-clear sound quality from the built-in dual stereo speakers. With T-shaped correction and 50% zoom function, you can adjust the screen size from 50% to 100%, ensuring perfect image projection and the best viewing effect. Note: When you reduce the screen size, the video screen size also decreases, but the main screen and settings screen size remain unchanged.

💖【Wide Compatibility and Multifunctionality】 Our mini projector has multi-device connectivity and is widely compatible with various smart devices such as smartphones, laptops, tablets, U disks, TV boxes, and game consoles. Connect your favorite device anytime, anywhere and enjoy a diverse entertainment experience. When connect with phone, an extra HDMI adapter (Not Included) is needed. Due to copyright of Apps, Netflix, Prime Video, Hulu, etc. can only play via TV Stick, Roku, etc.

💖【Excellent Service & 2 Year Guarantee】 The XuanPad projector team strives to provide high quality service and satisfied after-sales protection. If you encounter any issues, please feel free to contact us. We also offer a 2 year warranty for your peace of mind. PowerPoint and business presentations are not recommended. This is a home projector. This portable projector weighs only 1.45KG, will be an unforgettable gift for your family and friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This upgraded version is worth buying.
reviews.reviewText: This projector is way better than the previous model. It is packed with many features . Lets dig in shall we?The projector was shipped and arrived in a couple days. Unboxing it I noticed it was packed very well and had almost everything I needed to start. The remote does not have batteries included and there is not a USBc cable included either. Be sure to pick these up if you're wanting to stream from your android phone or laptop with only USBc connections. The HDMI, RCA, and power cables were all there!Now it was easy to set up and the instructions were actually helpful.It has 2 HDMI inputs so you can have two different devices connected like a TV and its just switch inputs to view.I connected my PC and wow big and bright!The focus ring and keystone are side by side and this is a game changer. So easy to get it crisp this way!The internal speaker is loud enough to fill a prestation room with sound without the need for external speakers. It has an audio out small headphone jack for using external speakers.This model does not have Bluetooth connectivity.The 2 weeks of presentations and the night I was streaming Phish it worked flawlessly!This is worth buying and provides plenty if entertainment value!So stop reading this already and go by it!I will be using this to rear project the AtmosFX halloween videos ..I already tested it.. yea its gonna be awesomeness !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for Holiday Window Video effects
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this to have a low cost, budget friendly way of broadcasting Halloween video effects on a window and it served its purpose just fine. I had one already, an RCA w/bluetooth for another window.Only drawback is this one has no built in bluetooth for outputting sound so your only option for external speakers is music cable output. However I used it only for silent spooky effects and had no issue.Turns on fast, boots up quickly, remote is easy to use. The picture was actually broader (widthx height) than my other more expensive RCA home theater projector. I don't plan to use it for actual home theater purposes but it seems to be suitable so long as you are okay with hard wiring a speaker or using the internal speaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good for the price and intended use
reviews.reviewText: We got this for camping or going to friends and hanging outside. The speakers do get a decent volume when you go though the sound options and fiddle, but it's a little hard to get the whole screen pixel perfect though. You need it sitting directly straight with no tilt to the lense for it all to be clear. It does seem to get hot pretty fast which is worrying for how long it will last. Fingers crossed we can at least use it a whole summer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this projector because I needed something for impromptu movie nights with friends and family. The product came quickly and the packaging was very protective of the contents. It came with audio cables, power cable, hdmi, and lense cleaner. There is also a remote (pictured) to control volume of the projector and the various menus.Setting up the projector was easy. It has a connector in the bottom to use with a tripod if you so desired and that’s what I did. Installation was easy and once I had it adjusted to my desired size of screen I just moved the dial to print the picture into focus. Picture quality is crisp and the bulb is bright.The thing I love this for best is when we are hosting some families with list of children for a party. I’d things start to get noisy I can set up this projector very quickly and have a movie on for the kids in no time flat. The internal speaker is loud enough for everyone to hear and the fan for the projector is nice and quiet.The size of the projector makes it easy to store and keep safe. Overall I’m very pleased with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this projector because I needed something for watching movie outdoors with friends and family. Also I am trying to learn projector photography. The product came quickly and the packaging was very protective of the contents. It came with audio cables, power cable, hdmi, and lense cleaner. There is also a remote (pictured) to control volume of the projector and the various menus.Setting up the projector was easy. Picture quality is crisp and the bulb is bright.The thing I love this for best is customer support.It is amazing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The compact sizes a versatility.
reviews.reviewText: Great projector! Very easy to use and connects to my phone or computer which is great. I can easily show photos or project an image on to a canvas to ensure my under drawing has the correct dimensions.Also, I have to say that the customer service I have received is the best!Satisfied customer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent projector with loud sound at a great price.
reviews.reviewText: This is the second projector I've owned and this one is loaded up on all aspects. It has multiple HDMI inputs as well as multiple USB inputs. It also has 3.5mm audio out and analog AV in. This is definitely built to be a replacement for a traditional TV. You could hook everything up to this and use it as your main screen. The picture is very bright and clear and has a good range, you could get a giant picture from this.The main thing that jumped out at me is the loud sound, much louder than any other projector I've used. You could get away with not using an external speaker if you are ok with not having much bass.Also some tiny things to note - it does have an attachment for a tripod which is useful. It comes with AV and HDMI cables. Only thing missing is a 3.5mm audio cable but those are easy to come by.Overall a very solid projector with everything I need. I will be using this for many weekly outdoor movie nights with the guys.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bad visuals. No audio. And weird smell when on?
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Did not work… I’m really disappointed because everyone else has reviewed that it worked great, but the visual was grainy and had color streaks through out. No audio and for some reason it would disconnect and reconnect to my laptop a lot even though the HDMI was plugged in correctly. I would say don’t buy this it’s pretty bad, and it’s only been on for 10 minutes and it gives a bad smoky smell. I’m definitely going to return this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Very bright and clear even under daylight (the video i show is under daylight), handy size, lightweight, easy to use, acceptable sound quality, perfect for the price

Photo is of during the day with windows closed - honestly pretty decent picture & even better at night. Keystone corrector only corrects vertically not horizontally and projector doesn’t allow for screen size adjustment but still good quality and decent internal speaker however I still better with external speaker attached

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really happy with this - used it for a family cinema night and then for projecting a Zoom meeting with overseas players for a rehearsal and meeting for an upcoming tour. Just what we needed, good picture, sound was fine in a small room but easily boosted by plugging in a speaker, small and neat enough to travel with. 2-year warranty a real plus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Fantastic product but I HAVE HAD MY FILL of Amazon my last review ever !!!
reviews.reviewText: I have done lots of reviews on products I bought from Amazon but this is my last review for Amazon I have had two eclectic items that did not work on the first day so a I lost my money and delivery times ect with them ok but now they have refused to post one of my reviews because of one word and ( Not a swear word ) so i had my fill with them and my future with prime my family and friends also are thinking of leaving has over this !! BUT AS FOR THIS LAST REVIEW FOR THIS XuarnPad mini projector is a little gem ok it's not the best out but i was very surprised it small but pust out a very good pitcher it quite bright even with some light believe me the quality of the picture is extremely good for the price good colours not bad contrast to gives a great 120inc pitcher size on my wall the look superb angin for the price the sound is amusing to from its to little speakers to , over all it's not a top range projector but you will be very surprised an amazed as what this mini projector can do for just £60 so the XanaPad mini projector is a must biy IF you need a cheep movie projector very highly recommended product!!! That all my ( ( THAS IT FOR MY LAST EVER REVIEW FOR AMAZON!!!!!! )

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic value for the money... I've only used it for a couple of movies, so can't speak to it's performance long term, but first impressions are really positive. I position it about 8 feet from a blank wall which gives a screen about 3 meters wide and it's very bright and clear at that size. The speakers aren't fantastic, so I use a bluetooth speaker to provide sound and that works perfectly. Fan is a little loud, but if you want one that's very quiet you're going to need to spend 4-5 times the cost of this one. Very happy with this purchase.
